description: Request for Screening Opinion in respect of proposed redevelopment of the Oaks Shopping Centre for partial refurbishment, demolition and redevelopment of shopping centre to provide 4 storey retail (ground and first floor) and offices (second and third floor) accommodation fronting High Street, 4/5 storey accommodation fronting Churchfield |Road (retail on ground and mezzanine levels and residential above) and a part 2/4/5/9 and 10 storey with two basement levels across the remainder of the site to provide a food store (3,264 square metres) and 10 retails units (2,918 square metres), 771 square metres of offices, and 3,068 square metres of other commercial uses, 124 residential units (65 x 1 bed, 53 x 2 bed and 6 x 3 bed) and ancillary service yard, storage, plant, circulation space, amenity space and play space, provision of 236 car parking spaces, including 13 disabled spaces (189 retail and 47 retail), 166 cycle parking spaces (42 retail and 124 residential), with vehicular access from Churchfield Road and access to the residential units off Churchfield Road and Hoppers Mews and provision of pedestrian link between High street and former burial ground. Town and country planning regulations (Environmental Impact Assessment) regulations 1999
